phrases: Home Delivery Vegetables Tanaka Farms Fresh Vegetables Set Veggies Good Enough to Be the Main Dish!
We Support Your New Life Campaign
Let us get pizza for lunch!
We just had pizza the other day.
You need to eat more veg
A-Actually, my parents sent me some Akita Komachi...
That will help out a lot.
Why do not you stay for lunch?
You did give us rice from Akita, after all.
Since junk food is all Umaru ever eats,
I will show her how delicious Japanese food can be.
I am going to go all-out and use an earthenware pot.
He is all hyped up now.
No, it is no problem at all.
Since you are with us, we should have gone out to eat.
Oh, but I am always by myself,
so it makes me happy to be able to eat a home-cooked meal with others like this.
I cooked some white rice in the earthenware pot.
And I chose side dishes that should go well with white rice.
I guess rice from Akita really is different!
That means you like it, right?
The rice from Akita was great.
Thanks for inviting me for lunch.
Oh, I guess she is posing like that to try to keep her tummy quiet.
Why do not we order some pizza, then, Onii-chan?
But pizza would be kind of...
Then maybe we can order a half-size.
No proposal from our team has ever passed one of these meetings.
The best way for an organization to convey its ideals is through meetings.
Therefore, we have all of our employees in attendance when we present any proposals.
This is because it is impossible to reach the best solution with the power of one alone.
Then again, the breads are appealing, too.
Nothing says snacks like potato chips!
This is a staple, and the most obvious choice!
This is why you cannot rely on old people.
We should throw out such antiquated ideas.
Did we always have an Umaru like that?
Yeah, you know, when the personality that is sort of fake-like comes out?
Then what do you think we should get, Umaru?
From now on, we should expand our horizons when choosing snacks.
I am sure you are curious as to what they taste like.
This Taste is a New Discovery!
If that is the case, I prefer chocolate.
When did you convert to mushrooms, Umaru?!
Chocolate Bamboo Shoot Mountains are best!
I have always liked chocolate mushrooms better!
Stop fighting over something so trivial!
You know nothing beats Suginoko's Town!
B-But, I mean, you never know...
If we choose cake, there will be a lot of trouble.
How many times must I tell you we have to go with Tontacos?!
We must go with beef jerky!
I think I want something that gives you energy.
But I am surprised you knew, Umaru.
You knew it would pass, so you got me something to celebrate, right?
Meeting to Decide What Snack to Cheer Onii-chan Up With When His Proposal Fails at His Meeting
Man, I cannot believe it actually passed.
Maybe I should have gone with the cake...
His proposal passed, so he is been all hyper since yesterday.
But I am sure a proposal Onii-san came up with must be amazing.
Um, are you sure it is okay for me to come along?
Celebrations like this get you psyched up for the next project.
I-I need to make sure not to eat too much today...
My tummy kept rumbling last time, and I even ate that pizza...
Hearty Bitter Chocolate and Banana Sundae
It is been so long since I have had parfaits!
This is to thank you for the snack.
Which one are you getting, Ebina-chan?
If I eat a lot in front of Umaru-chan, she might think I am weird.
I will have what you are having, Umaru-chan!
Will you be able to finish those?
What are you talking about, Onii-chan?
Girls slurp up parfaits like they are nothing.
Like when they say there is always room for dessert?
That is fine, but I kind of doubt you can.
Come on, let us eat, Ebina-chan.
Ebina-chan, you have not eaten at all.
I do not think it was quite enough, though.
There is always so much rain this time of year...
It keeps raining every day, and it is all humid.
Well, we are in the middle of the rainy season.
I do not feel like doing anything.
That is no different from usual.
Is she actually using the rainy season as an excuse to laze around?
Er, what is the matter, Kirie-chan?
Actually, I am always like this when it rains.
Did she just remember something horrible?
You cannot do this, you two!
It is times like these that you need to hype yourself up!
That is not happening with this rain.
There are good things about the rainy season, too.
For example, the sound of the rain.
Listen to this sound that soothes the heart.
Do not you think it has a certain charm?
Maybe this sort of elegance is beyond high schoolers...
I guess the rain does not have a very good image.
Maybe I should give them something to look forward to.
When the rainy season ends, summer will be here!
Why do not we go to the ocean?
How are we going to get to the ocean?
I guess we could ask Bomber to drive.
I guess you have not met him, Kirie-chan.
He is a friend of mine.
I am sure he will be fine if he is a friend of yours, Onii-san...
But it is so hot in summer.
does not ice cream taste even better?
Summer is amazing, is not it, Master?!
Summer has the best snack of all: ice cream!
Well, one way or another, I guess it is good they cheered up.
My younger sister, Umaru, is hot and popular.
She is kind, smart, and gifted with many talents.
She is the perfect high school student, without any flaws.
At least, that is what everyone seems to think...
I got some really great stuff.
It is so hot again today.
I want something cold to eat.
Ah, Ebina-chan, you got the red bean wafer sandwich.
You got the soda one, Umaru-chan?
Nothing says summer like ice cream.
The way it is facing, and that angle...
How do you achieve such balance?!
I love all things Japanese, so I drink matcha all the time.
Still, you have got a lot to learn if you are eating ice cream in a cup like that.
When you eat ice cream in a cup...
Emperor penguins live in a very cold region,
and stand very still, even when warming their eggs.
than watching a DVD on emperor penguins while eating ice cream.
Have some ice cream, too, Kirie-chan.
That is your ice cream, so I could never...
You even have a cooler just for them!
It is a must-have item for summer!
Th-Then is it okay if I have this mint chocolate chip?
Mint chocolate chip: a staple of summer.
This is because of all my hard work every day.
Does not it look like the parfait you had the other day?
Uh, you should have seen that coming...
That is my one and only little sister, Umaru.
You have been eating tons of ice cream every day, have not you?!
When did you buy a cooler?!
You were hiding it, were not you?!
The next episode is the last one!
I will do my best to the very end!
I will follow you to the ends of the earth!
We shall battle, even in the last episode!
I am just going to laze around, even in the last episode.
